member.name: T:Haply.HardwareAPI.Kinematics.FrameOffsets
member.summary: Linear and angular displacements between two frames, according to the true Denavitâ€“Hartenberg parameter formulation.

member.name: F:Haply.HardwareAPI.Kinematics.FrameOffsets.d
member.summary: Linear displacement along previous Z axis, from the previous X axis to the new X axis, in meters.

member.name: F:Haply.HardwareAPI.Kinematics.FrameOffsets.a
member.summary: Linear displacement along the new X axis, from the previous Z axis to the new Z axis, in meters.

member.name: F:Haply.HardwareAPI.Kinematics.FrameOffsets.theta
member.summary: Angular displacement about previous Z axis, from the previous X axis to the new X axis, in radians.

member.name: F:Haply.HardwareAPI.Kinematics.FrameOffsets.alpha
member.summary: Angular displacement about the new X axis, from the previous Z axis to the new Z axis, in radians.

member.name: T:Haply.HardwareAPI.Kinematics.I3DOFKinematics
member.summary: Calculates forward/inverse kinematics.

member.name: M:Haply.HardwareAPI.Kinematics.I3DOFKinematics.ForwardKinematics(System.Single[]@)
member.summary:
Convert joint angles to a linear position in 3-dimensional space according to the following axis convention:
Positive X: Right,
Positive Y: Forward,
Positive Z: Up

member.name: M:Haply.HardwareAPI.Kinematics.I3DOFKinematics.InverseKinematics(System.ValueTuple{System.Single,System.Single,System.Single}@,System.Single[]@)
member.summary:
Convert a linear position in 3-dimensional space to joint angles, according to the following axis convention:
Positive X: Right,
Positive Y: Forward,
Positive Z: Up

member.name: M:Haply.HardwareAPI.Kinematics.I3DOFKinematics.JacobianCalculation(System.Single[]@)
member.summary: Calculate a Jacobian matrix based on a set of joint angles.

member.name: M:Haply.HardwareAPI.Kinematics.I3DOFKinematics.VelocityCalculation(Haply.HardwareAPI.Kinematics.Matrix3x3{System.Double}@,System.Single[]@)
member.summary: Use a Jacobian matrix to calculate the linear velocity corresponding to a set of angular velocities.
member.param: Angular velocity values, in degrees per second.
member.returns: A linear velocity, in meters per second.

member.name: M:Haply.HardwareAPI.Kinematics.I3DOFKinematics.TorqueCalculation(Haply.HardwareAPI.Kinematics.Matrix3x3{System.Double}@,System.ValueTuple{System.Single,System.Single,System.Single}@,System.Single[]@)
member.summary: Use a Jacobian matrix to calculate the set motor torques corresponding to a linear force.
member.returns: True, if the calculation was successful.

member.name: F:Haply.HardwareAPI.Kinematics.MathUtility.RADIANS_TO_DEGREES
member.summary: Coefficient to multiply with a rotation in radians to obtain the same rotation in degrees.
